_header: In nomine patris at my crown

BLLan96.Transcription:
In nomine patris at my crowneFilius speritus vpp &
                    downeCorpus Christi att my BresteJesus take my soule into restIn
                    the name of the father & of the soneAnd of the holye goste
                    amen
BLLan96.Editions:
Sparrow-Simpson,  W. 
             “On a Magical Roll Preserved in the British Museum.” 
             Journal of the British Archaeological Association
         48 (1892): 38-54: 45.
